attributes.comment:
I write on behalf of myself and many others in our situation. We are proudly
adopting a child from Guatemala. The costs of adoption are tremendous! I am
asking that fees related to USCIS remain unchanged. As I said, costs are
outrageous and these fee increases only add to the overwhelming burden already.
Like many others, all we want to do is add to our family through adoption while
helping a child in desperate need of a loving family. Without families like us,
these children would live in dire poverty, malnourishment, possible abuse....
Please, do not increase the current fees. It is bad enough that our unchanged
fingerprints are only "valid" for 18 months, now our United States Govt is trying to
penalize potential adoptive families with outrageous fees. These fees may
eliminate some families from proceeding with an adoption. The end result will be
more poverty, sickness and possible death for all of these innocent children.
Please give this serious consideration, children are depending on you.

Thank You

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lisa Severa
